title: Alabama Survives Volunteer Scare
text:
Saturday, October 24 2015, 11:38 PM EDT Alabama Survives Volunteer Scare Eighth-ranked Alabama pulled out a 19-14 home win against Tennessee Saturday on Derrick Henry's 14-yard touchdown run with 2:24 left in the game. The Crimson Tide's aggressive defense preserved the win by recording two straight sacks before Ryan Anderson knocked the ball loose from Joshua Dobbs. The Vols took the lead on Jalen Hurd's 12-yard scoring run with 5:49 left. Alabama has now defeated Tennessee nine straight times. Tennessee is at Kentucky next weekend.
